SMW Subobject for Gu'TanothNPC location: Gu'TanothUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 4368, 4369, 4370, 4371, 4372Examine: These ogres guard the city.Release date: 7 May 2003Image: File:Ogre guard.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Ogre guard

Ogre guards can be found all over Gu'Tanoth and Jiggig. To gain access to the ogre city, you must present the Ogre relic to a guard.

In the city, the Ogre Guards will ask you to bring them something like a gold bar or, from the market (a rock cake). If you haven't got it the second time you meet them, they punch you down the hill and you will lose a varied amount of Hitpoints.

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Click here for a list of other transcripts that this NPC speaks in.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 December 2006
(update)

The Gu'Tanoth guards' combat levels of 83 were removed.
